headline: Realty Income Corporation (O) Prices $800 Million Public Offering of Senior Unsecured Notes
summary: With significant revenue and dividend growth, Realty Income Corporation (NYSE:O) makes our list of the 20 Best Stocks to Buy and Hold for a Lifetime.
